posts.post_content:
For sale is a lot of 27 T206's.  Most of them are Piedmont backs.  Asking $450  shipped.  They will be shipped in individual card holders, so you can ignore the binder sheets.  As of now I am not looking to sell individual cards, but feel free to PM me if there is something you really need. 

[url]ckb333@gmail.com[/url]  

SOLD
